image_prompt: A Minecraft-style depiction of Ravenwood Manor, a large, gothic-style mansion at dusk.  Detective Emily Windsor, a pixelated woman in a trench coat, stands in the cobblestone entryway, looking up at the imposing building.  The sky is a blend of orange and purple.
teaching_text: Ravenwood Manor. A chilling autumn evening.

image_prompt: Inside the manor's foyer, lavish Minecraft furniture and stained-glass windows.  Professor Winter, a pixelated man in a tweed jacket, points towards a body on the floor (Mr. Blackstone). Lady Victoria stands beside him, visibly upset. The body is pixelated and has a clear wound.
Close-up on Mr. Blackstone's lifeless body. A piece of torn purple fabric is clutched in his hand. Scrawled on the floor nearby in dirt is the message: "The lavender blooms in her room."
Captain Fanshawe, a pixelated man in a military uniform, speaks to Detective Windsor.  The background shows a Minecraft-style library.
teaching_text: "I heard a shot and footsteps towards the gardens."

image_prompt: Mrs. LaRue, a pixelated housekeeper in a maid's uniform, nervously looks at Detective Windsor.  In the background, a blurry Mr. Silas Markham is visible.
teaching_text: "I noticed Mr. Markham was acting strangely."

image_prompt: Professor Thistlewaite, a pixelated man with wild hair, excitedly explains something to Detective Windsor.  Books and strange artifacts are scattered on a table.
teaching_text: "An ancient harvest goddess cult! The fabric, the message... it's all connected."

image_prompt: Dr. Patel, a pixelated woman in a doctor's coat, examines the body.  Medical tools are scattered around.
Detective Windsor discovers a hidden room in Lady Victoria's chambers. It is filled with Minecraft-style ancient artifacts and books. A small, ornate box emitting a faint purple glow is on a dresser.
teaching_text: A hidden room... and a note.

image_prompt: Detective Windsor confronts the suspects (Professor Winter, Captain Fanshawe, Mrs. LaRue, Mr. Markham) in a grand Minecraft ballroom.  She holds the torn fabric and the note.
Professor Winter is being led away in handcuffs by a pixelated police officer. Detective Windsor looks on, her expression serious.  The background is the grand ballroom.
